name: Army Truck Transport Soldier
description:
Welcome to the army truck driving 3d!!
Stop your army truck while comes army checkpoint!!



TIPS:
- Get cash reward
- Complete every mission before allocated time
- unlock exciting features of military truck
- Don’t hit any hurdle like mines and stones otherwise army truck will be crashed


Controls:

- Tilt
- Buttons
- Steering



Golden Key Features:

- HD graphics
- Real military minecrasfts
- Multiple camera 3D views
- Plenty of military trucks and army trucks
- Various army jeeps and military jeeps
- Plenty of military officer commands
